author: EXM7777
text:
99% of "i one-shotted this website with Gemini" tweets are fake...

that being said, there IS a way to get pretty damn close, it's just not the sexy one-click magic they pretend it is

if you want to *nearly* one-shot a landing page, here's how to do it:

1. find a landing you like (framer marketplace has hundreds)
2. use that gofullscreen extension, save it as PDF + grab preview link
3. craft a smart prompt (this is where everyone sucks)

your prompt needs to nail these:

- modular approach: "build section by section, validate with me before moving to next block" this basically stops Gemini from building garbage
- real functionality: "build actual animations, button clicks, working graphs", not just a pretty facade that falls apart when you click
- responsive design: insist on it, or you'll get desktop-only mess

send the PDF, link, and prompt... then validate each section as it builds

you'll have a decent landing page in maybe 15min

(though honestly you should just use framer or wordpress... be normal, this is more of a party trick than a real workflow)

but at least now you know how the magicians do it
